pr_title: Add support for a 'format' option in fields retrieval.

timeline.message: Pull FieldAndFormat into its own top-level class.
Only include non-empty field lists in the response.
Add support for passing a custom date format.

timeline.author: nik9000

replies.bodyText: I agree, instead of a function we could even introduce an object like SourceValueParser. This could also help clean up some of the fragility around the dual lookupValues and parseSourceValue methods. It did feel like overkill to do this refactor now, though.
replies.author: jtibshirani
